name: Fruit Warrior AR
description:
Welcome Stranger!

Ever felt like a fighter, a samurai, or even a warrior?
Ever wanted to bash and smash fruits as if there was no tomorrow?
You don't like unrealistic looking stuff?
Then this game is right for you!

You can choose between 4 different game modes:
Classic, Challenge, Exotic-Rush and Zen (for relaxation)

Game-play is simple. Fruits jump out of the basket. Cut them through with the machete. The smaller the fruit, the higher the reward. You must not need to be a ninja to master it. But beware, there are traps!

For an optimal gaming experience, use the focus-square to point on a range between 2 and 5 meters in front of you. Slowly scan the floor. When a suitable surface is found the red game-play button shows-up. Choose your favorite game-mode. Place the wire-frame-basket as you like. Press the game-play button.

Use the reset button at any time if you have trouble finding a surface or the focus-square is not responsive. The more details a surface has, the better it is for the gaming experience. Good lighting conditions are required.

We designed this game photo-realistic and with love. Over 40 high-quality, professional 3D models of fruit and numerous other models have been used to give you the best gaming experience.

Fruit Warrior AR contains the following fruits:
Apple, Apricot, Lemon, Orange, Pear, Plum, Pineapple, Strawberry, Tomato, Watermelon, Avocado, Peach, Coconut, Kiwi, Cherry, Pomegranate, Dragonfruit, Kivano, Pepino, Starfruit, Chompu, Fig, Guava, Lime, Passionfruit, Cocoa, Mango, Papaya, Persimmon, Quince, Tamarillo, Grapes, Melon, Pamela, Anona, Chestnut, Sapodilla, Raspberry, Banana

If you have any comments or suggestions, just email us: info@zay.ch

Remember: Touching the Dragon toggles the Art-Deco elements ON and OFF

enjoy...
